page.title: 12LIFE STYLES
page.content:
'The Lady in Grey' Restaurant, Shardlow is licenced, with a seating capacity of 70 to 80 people, where lunches and dinners may be consumed. The Clock Warehouse Restaurant offers cream teas, homemade pastries, snacks, lunches and dinners.
PUBLIC HOUSES Navigation Inn, London Rd., Shardlow supply bar snacks. New Inn, Shardlow, supply bar snacks The Malt Shovel, Shardlow also supply bar snacks Wilsthorpe Tavern, New Sawley owned by Shipstones Brewery was built in 1961. Harrington Arms, Tamworth, Sawley supply bar snacks. The Nags Head, Old Sawley The Railway Inn, Wilne Road, Sawley The New Inn, Tamworth Road, Sawley Lion and Dragon, Wilmot Street Sawley.
